The German Research Foundation has ended its sponsorship of the research project 'Analyse Des Chemischen Reaktionsmechanismus Des Ozonabbaus Und Der Halogenfreisetzung In Der Polaren Troposphäre Basierend Auf Numerischer Modellierung Und Feldstudien' as of January 1st, 2022. This project, which utilized numerical modeling and field studies to investigate the chemical reaction mechanism of ozone depletion and halogen release in the polar troposphere, will no longer receive funding from the foundation. The Japanese American National Museum officially joined the North American Reciprocal Museum Association on Saturday, October 1st, 2022, marking the beginning of its membership in the organization. This new affiliation is expected to expand the museum's reach and offer its members reciprocal benefits with other participating institutions. As a result, visitors to the Japanese American National Museum can now enjoy perks at numerous museums across North America.
